c74object.name: mx-c
c74object.digest: Generate rhythms by contracting a group of pairs
c74object.description: mx-c generates and outputs a two-part rhythmical pattern from the sequence of a two generator fractioned interference (see mxp2) and a two-generator interference (see mxp1). It is called contraction because we are moving from a long to a short group, according to Chapter 5 of Schillingers book.

outlet.description: According to the formula n = a - b + 1, this outlet will output b patterns b0-bn in the format b0patbin(list).

method.name: gen
method.description: The gen message generates and outputs a two-part rhythmical pattern. The periodicity of the generators must be included as arguments to this message. The syntax is thus: gen gena (int) genb (int).

method.name: bang
method.description: Outputs the resulting patterns calculated from the arguments or gen message.
